DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to understand the smoking behavior of female incarcerated smokers and to determine how smokers differ from non-smokers on measures of substance abuse, personality, criminal history, and mental illness
DOC.brief_title: To Examine Smoking Behavior of Prisoners - 1
DOC.criteria: all smokers, nonsmokers, and exsmokers inability to understand English and inability to be able to provide informed consent due to mental impairment
